item.title: “Symphony”—a solo exhibition by Arts Sr. Lecturer Kenneth Ragsdale at the Front Room Gallery, on view through August 31
item.description: Ken’s mixed-media photographs are crafted from hand-built paper dioramas, lit like tiny theater sets and captured with a camera. Rooted in childhood memory, his work blends drawing, sculpture, lighting, and photography—an evocative nod to artists from the Hudson River School, the 1960’s German Realist photographers Bernd and Hilla Becher, and Ragsdale’s own memories of growing up in the Pacific Northwest. The show is open Fri-Sun through Aug 31, 12-5 at the Front Room Gallery and by appointment.

item.title: Change in Faculty/Staff Meal Plan Option
item.description:
As part of our ongoing efforts to streamline services, changes in meal pricing and offering greater flexibility, we will transition fully to the Community RAD (Rensselaer Account Dollars) system at the start of the Fall 2025 Semester as the primary dining option for faculty and staff. For more information or to set up your Community RAD account, please visit the Campus Card Website, or contact the Campus Card Office at 518-276-6670 or email at campuscard@rpi.edu.
